snippet: Carlos Sierra, 36, a detective who was off duty when the hit-and-run occurred in 2012, faces four misdemeanor charges.
abstract: Off-duty New York City Police Detective Carlos Sierra is arrested; faces four misdemeanor charges, including official misconduct, leaving the scene of an accident, assault and criminal mischief, for hit-and-run in Bronx that occurred in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Sierra, 36, a detective who was off duty when the hit-and-run occurred in 2012, faces four misdemeanor charges.

headline.main: Officer Is Arrested in Bronx Crash
